title: FDIC acting chair says framework for stablecoin laws coming this month
contentSnippet: FDIC acting chair Travis Hill will inform the House Financial Services Committee that the regulator plans to propose how it will apply the GENIUS Act this month.

title: Dogecoin Wicks Below Key Support — Fakeout or Start of Larger Correction?
contentSnippet: Dogecoin's recovery remains fragile, with resistance between $0.1362 and $0.1386 needing to be overcome for a bullish shift.

title: Bitcoin miner Canaan plans adaptive green-energy mining platform
contentSnippet: Canaan has been steadily investing in renewable energy projects, with a gas-to-computing pilot in Canada and a deal to deploy miners at a wind-powered data center in Texas.

title: Bollinger Bands suggest Bitcoin bottom won’t fall under $55K
contentSnippet: A crypto analyst used Bollinger Bands and RSI data to argue Bitcoin’s bear market bottom will not pass under $55,000.

title: Bitcoin May Dump to $65K or Below, Spelling Trouble for ETH, XRP, ADA and Other Majors
contentSnippet: MSCI is considering removing Strategy Inc. from its major equity indices due to the company's large bitcoin holdings, which some traders say could scare smaller players.

title: Breakdown or Bear Trap? XRP Tests $1.99 as Market Signals Mixed Direction Ahead
contentSnippet: A break above $2.05–$2.07 is needed to shift momentum, while a fall below $2.00 could lead to further declines.

title: Here's Where Analysts Say Bitcoin Could Be Headed Next for the Rest of 2025
contentSnippet: Analysts see Bitcoin range-bound near $90K into year-end before a potential 2026 rally to $135K, contingent on Fed policy.

title: Ethereum ICO wallet moves $120M after a decade, throws it into staking
contentSnippet: Fears tend to mount whenever an OG crypto whale starts shifting funds, but this one used it to double down on the blockchain network.

title: BitMine buys $70M ETH while Tom Lee revises Bitcoin prediction
contentSnippet: BitMine now holds over $10 billion in Ether, doubling down on its strategy to accumulate 5% of the supply despite being underwater on its total position.

title: Ethereum devs work on ‘Secret Santa’ protocol to power privacy
contentSnippet: A Solidity engineer proposed a protocol earlier this year using zero-knowledge proofs and transaction relayers to enable a Secret Santa-like feature on Ethereum.

title: Bitcoin Traders Bet on Sub-$80K New Year: Derive
contentSnippet: Market positioning implies a meaningful probability of sub-$80K BTC to start 2026, Derive's Forster said.

title: Attention Bitcoin Bulls: The U.S. 10-Year Yield Isn't Budging Despite Fed Rate Cut Hopes
contentSnippet: Bitcoin bulls' hopes for rate cuts to lower bond yields and the dollar are challenged by signals from the Treasury and the FX market.

title: Cantor Fitzgerald Reveals Solana ETF Holdings in Latest Filing to SEC
contentSnippet: Cantor disclosed its first position in a newly listed Solana ETF, adding momentum to TradFi's shift toward regulated crypto exposure.

title: Frontier AI Models Demonstrate Human-Level Capability in Smart Contract Exploits
contentSnippet: New analysis showed models including Claude Opus and GPT-5 uncovered millions in simulated vulnerabilities across blockchains.

title: CZ’s YZi Labs moves to take over board of flatlining BNB treasury
contentSnippet: YZi Labs has asked CEA Industries shareholders to support its move to shake up the BNB treasury company’s board and install its pick of directors.

title: Asia Morning Briefing: This Year's Tether Debate is a Good One to Have
contentSnippet: The crypto market has spent years arguing about Tether’s reserves – sometimes with more hyperbole than substance – but the latest debate is sharper and more revealing than usual.

title: China's Z-Image Dethrones Flux as King of AI Art—And Your Potato PC Can Run It
contentSnippet: The six-billion-parameter model is beating Flux2 on hardware from 2019, and the open-source community is going wild.

title: Japan government backs 20% tax on crypto profits, on par with stocks
contentSnippet: Japan has taken another step to reform its crypto taxation, replacing its tiered system that can reach as high as 55%.

title: Vanguard’s 50M+ clients will soon have access to crypto ETFs
contentSnippet: Vanguard CEO Salim Ramji ruled out crypto ETFs on its platform in August, but consistent demand for crypto has seemingly changed his firm’s tune.

title: Changpeng Zhao, YZi Labs Seek Shakeup at BNB Treasury Firm After Stock Craters
contentSnippet: Binance co-founder Changpeng "CZ" Zhao and YZi Labs are seeking a management overhaul at publicly traded BNB treasury, CEA Industries.

title: 'Mad Cow Disease': Grand Theft Auto Dev Warns That Generative AI Could Harm Games
contentSnippet: Famed GTA developer Dan Houser said models trained on synthetic data could degrade game quality as creators rapidly adopt AI tools.

title: Bitcoin’s lack of price strength due to sheepish spot buyers: What happens next?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin fudged the breakout to $93,000 as global TradFi markets stumbled and BTC spot investors failed to provide the necessary volume.

title: U.S. FDIC Chief Says First GENIUS Act Regulations Heading for Proposal This Month
contentSnippet: FDIC Acting Chairman Travis Hill is set to testify at a House hearing that his agency is ready to propose a stablecoin application rule before the month is out.

title: Vanguard to Allow Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP ETF Trading in Major Crypto Pivot
contentSnippet: Vanguard will allow trading of crypto-focused ETFs and mutual funds on its brokerage platform, ending years of resistance.

title: Kalshi Pushes Further Into Crypto With On-Chain Prediction Markets on Solana
contentSnippet: Kalshi's prediction market contracts are now tokenized on Solana, unlocking access to the crypto economy, the firm announced on Monday.

title: Vanguard Opens Platform to Crypto ETFs in Major Shift: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: The move will give access to the firm's 50 million clients to invest in regulated digital asset ETFs, a reversal from Vanguard's long-standing anti-crypto stance.

title: Kalshi Wants Protection From State Regulators as It Appeals Nevada Loss
contentSnippet: Kalshi lost court protection in Nevada and now faces enforcement while it appeals, even as its business booms and valuation hits $11 billion.

title: Bearish Signals Abound for Bitcoin and Ethereum: Here’s What the Charts Say
contentSnippet: Bitcoin fell as low as $85,000 today, with Ethereum likewise down nearly 10%. Prediction markets are beginning to reflect what the charts are suggesting.

title: Seller Exhaustion or a Bottom? Strategy Gains 11% From Session's Worst Levels
contentSnippet: Peter Schiff took a victory lap after the company Monday morning announced it had raised $1.44 billion via common stock sales as a reserve to pay preferred dividends for nearly two years.

title: Kalshi Launches Tokenized Event Bets on Solana Blockchain: CNBC
contentSnippet: The prediction market is rolling out tokenized contracts on Solana to meet crypto traders where they already are, Kalshi told CNBC.
